newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Gulf rigs under contract down 2 at 162.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Gulf rigs under contract down 2 at 162.

text.p: There were 162 rigs under contract in the U.S. Gulf as of December 6, unchanged from the prior week, Offshore Data Services said.
The utilization rate for rigs working in the Gulf, based on a total fleet of 178, was 91.0 percent.
The number of working rigs in European/Mediterranean remained the same this week at 106 rigs under contract out of a total fleet of 106, a utilization rate of 100 percent.
The worldwide rig count fell four to 560 out of a total fleet of 604, making the utilization rate 92.7 percent.
